renewalWaiver.waiverText: Annual fee waived on annual spends of ₹2,00,000

latePayment.calculation: Tiered based on total amount due

additionalFee.condition: Additional late payment fee if MAD missed for two consecutive cycles

overLimit.calculation: 2.5% of overlimit amount or ₹600, whichever is higher

utilityPaymentFee.note: Applicable if total utility payments exceed ₹50,000 in a billing cycle

educationPaymentFee.condition: On education payments via third-party apps like CRED, Cheq, MobiKwik
educationPaymentFee.exception: Direct payments to colleges/schools via their websites or POS are exempt

existingRelationship.note: Existing SBI Bank relationship not mandatory

creditLimit.factors: Based on income, credit score, credit history, and existing relationship
creditLimit.enhancementCriteria: Good repayment history for 6+ months; pre-approved limits offered to eligible customers

purchaseAPR.note: Revised to 3.75% p.m. (45% p.a.) effective November 1, 2024

gracePeriod.note: Interest-free period of 20 to 50 days from transaction date if previous balance paid in full

minPayment.calculation: 100% of GST + 100% of EMI amount + 100% of Fees/Charges + 100% of Finance Charges + Overlimit Amount + 2% of remaining balance outstanding

cashAdvance.note: 2.5% of cash amount or ₹500, whichever is higher

baseRate.note: 1 Reward Point per ₹100 spent on other retail purchases

rewards.earningText: Earn 1 Reward Point for every ₹100 spent on retail purchases (excluding mobile wallet upload & non-BPCL fuel spends)

categories: Rent payments (effective April 2024 for select cards)
Government transactions (effective June 2024 for select cards)
exclusions.note: Mobile wallet uploads and non-BPCL fuel purchases do not earn reward points

bpclFuel.note: Maximum 2,500 Reward Points per billing cycle on BPCL fuel

bharatGas.note: 25 RP per ₹100 on Bharat Gas (website/app) capped at 500 RP per billing cycle

acceleratedCategories.note: 10X rewards on Dining, Departmental Stores, Grocery & Movies capped at 7,500 RP per month

welcome.description: Get 6,000 bonus Reward Points (worth ₹1,500) on payment of joining fee

renewal.condition: On payment of annual fee (not waived)

bpclFuel.note: 25 Reward Points per ₹100 spent at BPCL fuel stations (6.25% value back)

bharatGas.note: 25 Reward Points per ₹100 on Bharat Gas website/app only, capped at 500 RP per billing cycle

dining.note: Part of 7,500 RP monthly cap shared with Departmental Stores, Grocery & Movies

departmentalStores.note: Part of shared 7,500 RP monthly cap

groceries.note: Part of shared 7,500 RP monthly cap

movies.note: Part of shared 7,500 RP monthly cap

nonBpclFuel.note: No rewards on non-BPCL fuel transactions

walletLoads.note: No rewards on mobile wallet loads

other.note: 1 Reward Point per ₹100 on all other retail purchases

bankPortal.note: SBI Card does not have a dedicated rewards portal like SmartBuy

redemption.bestOption: Instant redemption at BPCL petrol pumps
redemption.convenienceFeeNote: ₹99 redemption fee applicable on physical products

options.description: Instant redemption at BPCL petrol pumps
options.note: Redeem reward points instantly during billing at select BPCL outlets
₹99 redemption fee per request for physical products
Redeem against outstanding credit card statement

transferPartners.note: BPCL SBI Card OCTANE does not offer transfer partners

pooling.note: Point pooling not available on this card

rewards.specialLogic: Best value is achieved by redeeming at BPCL pumps at billing time. Total value back on BPCL fuel = 7.25% (6.25% rewards + 1% fuel surcharge waiver)

calculator.formula: For BPCL fuel: 25 points per ₹100 (max 2500/cycle); For dining/grocery/movies/dept stores: 10 points per ₹100 (max 7500/month combined); For other: 1 point per ₹100

validationFee.note: ₹2 non-refundable for Visa/RuPay; ₹25 refundable for Mastercard

programUpdate.changes: New lounge access program with Set A lounges for BPCL SBI Card OCTANE
programUpdate.note: Lounge access now managed by network partners for cards with ₹1,499 and ₹2,999 annual fees

international.note: No international lounge access on this card

milestones.benefit: Annual fee waiver for next year
₹2,000 e-Gift Voucher from Aditya Birla Fashion / Yatra / Bata / Hush Puppies
milestones.conditions: Choose from available brand options within 20 days of eligible spends
milestones.fulfillmentNote: SMS sent within 20 days of eligible spends; e-voucher delivered within 5 working days of selection

movies.note: No dedicated movie offers; earn 10X rewards on movie purchases

fuel.applicableStations: All BPCL petrol pumps in India
fuel.note: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on BPCL transactions up to ₹4,000 (exclusive of GST); Maximum waiver ₹100 per statement cycle

forex.markupText: 3.5% of transaction amount on foreign currency transactions

dynamicCurrencyConversion.recommendation: Always decline DCC and pay in local currency

forex.note: Forex markup applies to all non-INR transactions

noCostEMI.note: No-cost EMI on select merchants and products

emi.note: Convert purchases of ₹2,500 or more into EMI via sbicard.com within 30 days

balanceTransfer.note: Transfer outstanding balance from other bank cards at lower interest

fraudLiability.coverageWindow: 3 days prior to loss reporting to 7 days after
fraudLiability.reportingRequirement: Report card loss to SBI Card helpline: 1800 180 1295 or 39 02 12 12

insurance.note: BPCL SBI Card OCTANE offers only fraud liability cover; no travel or other insurance benefits

contactless.note: Contactless transactions up to ₹5,000 without PIN

upiLinking.note: RuPay variant can be linked to UPI; rewards applicable on UPI transactions

upgradesFrom.note: Upgrade from BPCL SBI Card (base variant with ₹499 annual fee)

upgradePathway.note: BPCL SBI Card OCTANE is the premium variant in the BPCL SBI Card series

meta.bestFor: Frequent BPCL fuel users who want maximum value back on fuel expenses and additional rewards on dining, groceries, and movies
meta.notRecommendedFor: Users who refuel at non-BPCL stations, those seeking international lounge access, or users wanting premium travel benefits
meta.verdict: The BPCL SBI Card OCTANE is one of the best fuel credit cards in India for BPCL loyalists, offering an industry-leading 7.25% value back on BPCL fuel (6.25% rewards + 1% surcharge waiver). The 10X rewards on dining, groceries, departmental stores, and movies add versatility beyond fuel. The ₹2 lakh annual spend requirement for fee waiver is achievable for regular users. The 4 complimentary domestic lounge visits per year add travel value at this price point. However, the 0.25% return on other spends is poor, and there's no international lounge access or premium travel benefits.
pros: 7.25% value back on BPCL fuel purchases (highest among fuel cards)
10X rewards on dining, groceries, departmental stores, and movies
4 complimentary domestic lounge visits per year
Annual fee waiver achievable at ₹2 lakh annual spend
Available on both Visa and RuPay networks
₹2,000 milestone voucher on ₹3 lakh annual spend
cons: No rewards on non-BPCL fuel purchases
Lounge access limited to 1 per quarter
Finance charges increased to 3.75% p.m. from November 2024

alternatives.reason: Higher 8.5% value back on Indian Oil fuel
Alternative fuel card for HPCL/IOCL users
Lower annual fee variant at ₹499 with 4.25% fuel value back

dataSource: SBI Card Most Important Terms & Conditions (MITC)

changelog.change: New domestic lounge access program with Set A/Set B lounges; validation fee introduced
1% fee on education payments via third-party apps introduced
MAD calculation revised to 2% of remaining balance
1% utility payment fee introduced for payments exceeding ₹50,000 per billing cycle
Finance charges increased from 3.5% to 3.75% p.m. on unsecured cards
Card launched as upgraded version of BPCL SBI Card
